pets.name: Joe
pets.backstory: Joe's previous owner unfortunately passed away so is looking for a new owner to provide him a forever home

pets.name: Kola
pets.backstory: Kola was found abandoned but has lots of energy which she wants share with a new owner

pets.name: Stella
pets.backstory: Stella is an ex service-dog that requires a new home now that she is older

pets.name: Ladybug
pets.backstory: Ladybug was a stray kitten when found and has been waiting some time for someone to adopt her

pets.name: Mr Fluffy
pets.backstory: Mr Fluffy became too big for his owner to take care of and now is looking for a new home

pets.name: Henrietta
pets.backstory: Henrietta was on her own for most of her life and is looking to join a new flock
pets.likes: Enjoys hanging out on her chicken swing

pets.name: Rocket
pets.backstory: Rocket is looking for a new paddock as her old one was sold to build houses on
pets.likes: Enjoys having scratches behind her ears
